data.event: Chatsworth was founded in 1905 as a depot on the Louisville and Nashville Railroad.

event.title: was incorporated as a town in 1906

data.event: It was incorporated as a town in 1906 and as a city in 1923.

event.title: 1915, the seat of Murray County was transferred

data.event: In 1915, the seat of Murray County was transferred to Chatsworth from Spring Place.
